title: White Plague Gaming Looking For ADCS and MIDS
body:
This is a serious team with schedule practices and we will participate in tournaments. You have to fill out application or you wont be able to tryout and please be a minimum of Gold Elo. Your Tryout will be a total of 3 games but if we decide to cut it after 1 or 2 for good or bad reasons I will let you know and let you know why especially if it was bad.

IGN:
ROLE:
Main Champs:
Shot Calling Exp: y/n If so how much:
Rank 5s Exp: y/n
Tourney Exp: y/n

replies.body: what times were u planning on playing?

IGN: Neophobia
ROLE: Mid/ADC
Main Champs: Ezreal, Zed, Kog'Maw, Yasuo, can play any mid | Corki, Graves, Lucian, Tristana
Shot Calling Exp: y/n If so how much: yes, not the best but can shotcall
Rank 5s Exp: y/n yes, I have played on teams in the past.
Tourney Exp: y/n yes, I have played in tournaments in the past.

IGN: Experiment 151

Role: Mid


Main Champs: {{champion:103}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:61}} 
Shot Calling Exp: y/n If so how much: I'm usually the shot caller but don't prefer to be.
Rank 5s Exp: y/n Yes i do ranked 5s with friends but haven't been on a serious one for a while.
Tourney Exp: y/n Yes i did alot of 1v1 tourneys on gamebattles. 5v5 random tourneys on different sights like olympus gamerz, Victorious Gaming, etc.

Im struggling to get back into gold i finished gold in preseason but im on tilt. Would atleast like a fair tryout.

Thanks for your time. :D

hnghhhh another one

Tourney Exp: y/n : I have played in some solo pug tournaments but not in groups, although I would be very interested to do so.
